  • Constructor Details

    • JDBCDoctorManager

      public JDBCDoctorManager(ConnectionManager cManager)
      Manages the doctor-related operations using a JDBC connection. Uses an instance of ConnectionManager to interact with the SQLite database.
      Parameters:
      cManager - The ConnectionManager instance used for database operations.

  • Method Details

    • addDoctor

      public void addDoctor(Doctor doctor, int userId)
      Adds a new doctor to the "Doctor" table in the database. Uses the provided Doctor object and user ID to insert the doctor's information.
      Specified by:
      addDoctor in interface DoctorManager
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor object containing the doctor's details (name and surname).
      userId - The user ID to associate with the doctor.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during the SQL operation.

    • getDoctorByUserId

      public Doctor getDoctorByUserId(int userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a Doctor object from the database based on the user ID. The Doctor is fetched by matching the given user ID with the doctor's user ID in the database.
      Specified by:
      getDoctorByUserId in interface DoctorManager
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID of the doctor to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Doctor object populated with data from the database, or null if no doctor is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error accessing the database.

    • getDoctorById

      public Doctor getDoctorById(int userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a Doctor object from the database based on the user ID. The Doctor is fetched by matching the given user ID with the doctor's user ID in the database.
      Specified by:
      getDoctorById in interface DoctorManager
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID of the doctor to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Doctor object populated with data from the database, or null if no doctor is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error accessing the database.

    • getIdByNameSurname

      public Integer getIdByNameSurname(String name, String surname) throws SQLException
      Retrieves an id from the database based on the name and surname. The id is fetched by matching the given name and surname with the doctor's parameters in the database.
      Specified by:
      getIdByNameSurname in interface DoctorManager
      Parameters:
      name - name of the doctor whose id we want to retrieve.
      surname - surname of the doctor whose id we want to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An id Ineteger, or null if no doctor is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error accessing the database.
